alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 15 at 3:34AM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FIRST SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM LIKELY THURSDAY NIGHT INTO SATURDAY... .Low pressure will redevelop along the Mid Atlantic Coast Thursday night and then move northeast off the New England coast Friday into Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland, Interior Waldo, Kennebec, and Androscoggin Counties. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Kennebec
